original: Vipākadhammadhammaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca navipākadhammadhammo nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: ▁vipāk adhamm adhamm aṃ ▁kusalaṃ ▁dhammaṃ ▁paṭicca ▁ navipākadhamma dhamm o ▁na kusal o ▁dhammo ▁uppajjati ▁hetupaccayā ▁saṃkhittaṃ ▁hetuyā ▁tīṇi ▁ adhipatiyā ▁tīṇi ▁pe ▁avigate ▁tīṇi

original: Vipākadhammadhammaṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca navipākadhammadhammo naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.

original: Nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammaṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paccayā nanevavipākanavipākadhammadhammo naabyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
